CustomField.description: Used to convert the third party type (multi-select picklist) to text which then is concatenated with the Vendor name via a Process Builder. Add "IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "[INSERT FI VENDOR TYPE]" ), "[INSERT FI VENDOR TYPE]",null ) &" at the end of the formula field if new picklist values are needed.
CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Appraiser" ), "Appraiser ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Attorney" ), "Attorney ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Demolition" ), "Demolition ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Demolition Contact" ), "Demolition Contact ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Inactive" ), "Inactive ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Inspector" ), "Inspector ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Insurance Agency" ), "Insurance Agency ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Mortgage Broker" ), "Mortgage Broker ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Mortgage Broker Contact" ), "Mortgage Broker Contact ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Real Estate Broker Buyer" ), "Real Estate Broker Buyer ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Real Estate Broker Buyer Contact" ), "Real Estate Broker Buyer Contact ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Real Estate Broker Seller" ), "Real Estate Broker Seller ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Real Estate Broker Seller Contact" ), "Real Estate Broker Seller Contact ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Settlement/Title Agent" ), "Settlement/Title Agent ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Settlement/Title Agent Contact" ), "Settlement/Title Agent Contact ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Survey" ), "Survey ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Survey Contact" ), "Survey Contact ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( LLC_BI__Third_Party__c , "Third Party Reports" ), "Third Party Reports ",null )
CustomField.label: Third Party Type Text
